channel.title: Email Database on Jay M. Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Email Database on Jay M. Patel

item.title: Introduction data enrichment based on email addresses and domain names
item.description: Data enrichment is a general term to denote any processes which enhance and enrich your existing database with additional information which can be used to drive your business goals such as marketing, sales and lead generation, customer relations by targeted outreach and preventing customer churn. Plainly speaking, all you are doing is going out to a third party data vendor and fetching additional data based on some common key. One of the most keys for data enrichment is searching based on email address or company’s domain address.
